channel.title: [LIVE NOW] EdgevillePK - The Fight Awaits - The server for YOU!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/d3ChQbC.png[/img]
[url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?site=mopar]Home[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/forums/member.php?action=register]Register[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/forums/]Community[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=downloads]Download[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=shop]Store[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=vote]Vote[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ha54IlJ.png[/img]
[B]Here at EdgevillePK, we pride ourselves on our successes and professionalism. If you're looking for a server that oozes experience and know-how, you neednt look further. We are a team of RSPS veterans with over 30 years experience in the scene when you combine us together. With that combination and our determination to make something that was a lot of fun for us years ago fun again, you'll see why we're a rapidly growing game and community. Our entire site and forums were either written or designed by myself and RevengePK, with our game development team falling not short of a miracle with the amount of effort we had to put into it to get it to a stage we felt comfortable with!
We intend on becoming the number one RSPS and if any team can fill soulsplits big boots from when they left, you've found it here. Come and have a look for yourself![/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/J175Uth.png[/img]
[LEFT][B] [ul][*]All skills are 100% trainable. [*]Over 30 years of experience in the field. [*]Nowhere near p2w, like most other servers. [*]Completely unique "Combat Card" system that offer a buff for x amount of time, revolutionises PK. [*]Three different game modes to suit any player! [*]Rapidly growing community. [*]Dedicated developers who don't require tutorials unlike most RSPS. [*]True community feeling, no bad blood. [*]Fully secure server thanks to Silabsoft/Sinisoul [*]Vast attention to detail, even down to our pure essence mining. [*]Professional and knowledgeable staff. [*]Weekly updates that release new content every FRIDAY! [*]And much much more![/ul]
[/B][/LEFT] [center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/47lXWbP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KSPuqHc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ky1y5Dq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kzrywiT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oVsHqTa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/weh4x9j.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oMILaeP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lgzPkeo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cPt7vkR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Y34fn5Q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lqAqKlk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JF89yuV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/irD5RgC.png[/img] [/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tJ7XXu8.png[/img] [center] [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?site=mopar]Home[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/forums/member.php?action=register]Register[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/forums/]Community[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=downloads]Download[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=shop]Store[/url] - [url=http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=vote]Vote[/url] [/center]

WiqO5tz.png764×502

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

i dd s k0 i:

Looks promising, although personally I would welcome some longer list of features or media. Gonna give it a try anyways! Best of luck.

We’ll push that out soon enough!

We’re live with the client download from: http://edgevillepk.com/index.php?action=downloads

Not bad for our first hour.

Home - Register - Community - Download - Store - Vote

 [B]Here at EdgevillePK, we pride ourselves on our successes and professionalism. If you're looking for a server that oozes experience and know-how, you neednt look further. We are a team of RSPS veterans with over 30 years experience in the scene when you combine us together. With that combination and our determination to make something that was a lot of fun for us years ago fun again, you'll see why we're a rapidly growing game and community. Our entire site and forums were either written or designed by myself and RevengePK, with our game development team falling not short of a miracle with the amount of effort we had to put into it to get it to a stage we felt comfortable with!

 We intend on becoming the number one RSPS and if any team can fill soulsplits big boots from when they left, you've found it here. Come and have a look for yourself![/B]
